definition: Relating to matters concerning governance, public affairs, or the organization and administration of a society. It is commonly used to describe anything pertaining to politics, political activities, or political ideologies.

examples.german: Die politische Lage ist sehr instabil.
examples.english: The political situation is very unstable.

examples.german: Die politische Partei hat viele Anhänger.
examples.english: The political party has many supporters.

examples.german: Politische Entscheidungen müssen gut überlegt sein.
examples.english: Political decisions must be well thought out.
